user.title: Configure Amazon Israel Shipping Watcher
user.description:
Enter Amazon product URLs (one per line) to monitor for free shipping to Israel.

You can optionally add a custom name by using the format: URL|Custom Name

Example:
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08N5WRWNW
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07XJ8C8F5|My Custom Product Name

error.invalid_urls: One or more URLs are not valid Amazon URLs

abort.already_configured: This set of URLs is already configured
